title: 9 delicious details about the Queen’s wardrobe from royal dresser Angela Kelly
text:
From a rainbow collection of umbrellas, to wearing in the Queen’s shoes, a new book released today by Her Majesty’s aide and royal dresser-in-chief Angela Kelly, shares unique insights into the strategic operation that is managing the Queen’s wardrobe.

The Other Side of the Coin: The Queen, the Dresser and the Wardrobe, details how Kelly and her team work to ensure that Her Majesty has exactly the right thing to wear to all of the 300-plus engagements she might attend in any year.

Here, I’ve selected nine highlights revealed in the book, which offer a rare glimpse inside The Queen’s wardrobe...
